lead_paragraph: American TV viewers used social media on Friday to vent their anger at U.S. broadcaster NBC for delaying the screening of the opening ceremony of the Rio Games by an hour and then going to repeated commercial breaks during the show.

headline.print_headline: American TV Viewers Slam NBC for Delaying Rio Broadcast
headline.main: American TV Viewers Slam NBC for Delaying Rio Broadcast

snippet: American TV viewers used social media on Friday to vent their anger at U.S. broadcaster NBC for delaying the screening of the opening ceremony of the Rio Games by an hour and then going to repeated commercial breaks during the show....
